pr_title: Check that Android required packages are present

timeline.message: Check that Android required packages are present, else install them with Android SdkManager

timeline.bodyText: this looks like all packages will be downloaded, not only the missing ones?
timeline.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText: No, the SdkManager verifies what is already installed and what needs to be installed or updated.
replies.author: jperedadnr

timeline.bodyText: It would be good to print the missing packages here, so that the developer (or we) can verify
timeline.author: johanvos
